Name: Love Accident
About the game: Dannet wants to become a knight. But it turned out that he ended up in the worst-scoring group. A bit different approach to Visual Novel with multiple dating events and endings. In this game you can: Try becoming a knight! Get into suggestive situations! Change your mind about becoming a knight! Spend time with the girls! The game has about 2 hours of content (All character routes. Depending on your reading speed).
